title: Bug 10762Generate getter and setter of a field starting with the 'F' letter
description: Bug 10762Generate getter and setter of a field starting with the 'F' letter @return Returns a Boolean /public Boolean getAnfan() {return fanfan;}/Sets the anfan. @param anfan The anfan to set /public void setAnfan(Boolean anfan) {fanfan = anfan;}/Gets the f.@return Returns a String /public String getF() {return ff;}/Sets the f.@param f The f to set /public void setF(String f) {ff = f;}/Gets the idji. @return Returns a int /public int getIdji() {return fidji;}/Sets the idji. @param idji The idji to set /public void setIdji(int idji) {fidji = idji;}Nicolas HERVEnherve@sysdeo.comSYSDEO98 route de la Reine 92100 BoulogneTél : +33 (0)1 41 22 03 00http://www.sysdeo.com
SR: Eclipse 2.0 Build 20020214If I generate the getter and setter methods of a field whose name starts withthe 'F' letter, this letter is ignored in the accessors method names.Examples :private int fidji;public String ff;protected Boolean fanfan;/Gets the anfan.
